description: From sparge +‎ -er or equivalent. Compare French asperger (“to sprinkle”), Latin aspergere, spargere.

entries.meaning: A vessel with a perforated cover for sprinkling a liquid.
(chemistry) A device for sparging, or introducing bubbles.
examples: More importantly, the use of the delta tube prevents dangerous backsplashing of the agent that can occur when an impinging sparger is used improperly.
